Text Comparison Tool - Advanced Diff Viewer for Chrome

Compare text instantly without the hassle of switching tabs or copy-pasting! Simply select text on any webpage, use keyboard shortcuts (Alt+1, Alt+2) or right-click to mark it, and your comparison is just a keystroke away (Alt+C).

Key Features:

‚ú® Revolutionary Time-Saving Workflow
- No more switching between tabs or copy-pasting
- Select and mark text directly on any webpage
- Compare text from different sources instantly
- Access comparison with a single keystroke (Alt+C)

üîç Intelligent Comparison
- Clear side-by-side diff view
- Smart word-level difference detection
- Highlight changes in different colors:
 ‚Ä¢ Deletions (red)
 ‚Ä¢ Insertions (green)
 ‚Ä¢ Case changes (purple)
- Toggle case sensitivity with one click

üéØ Advanced Pattern Recognition
- Automatic highlighting of:
 ‚Ä¢ Email addresses
 ‚Ä¢ URLs
 ‚Ä¢ Code snippets
 ‚Ä¢ IP addresses (IPv4 and IPv6)

Perfect for:
- Developers comparing code snippets
- Writers reviewing document versions
- Students checking text differences
- Business professionals reviewing changes

Quick Start:
1. Select text anywhere in Chrome
2. Press Alt+1 (original) or Alt+2 (modified)
  Or use right-click menu
3. Press Alt+C to see comparison

Privacy & Security:
- Works entirely in your browser
- No external services needed
- Your text remains private and secure

Pro Features:
- Line numbering for easy reference
- Clean, distraction-free interface
- Multiple text selection methods
- Real-time updates
- Handles multiple lines and empty spaces
- Preserves text formatting

Whether you're checking code changes, reviewing documents, or comparing any text, this tool makes it effortless to spot differences. Install now and transform the way you compare text!
